name: Paladin
shortDescription: Holy warriors bound by sacred oaths who wield divine power through conviction and steel.
description: Paladins are champions of ideals, sworn to uphold sacred oaths. They combine martial prowess with divine magic, smiting foes and protecting allies through faith and resolve.

spellcasting.description: Paladins prepare spells from the paladin spell list, channeling divine magic through devotion and oaths.

features.name: Divine Sense
features.description: You can open your awareness to detect celestial, fiend, and undead presence nearby.

features.name: Lay on Hands
features.description: You have a pool of healing power that replenishes when you take a long rest.

features.name: Fighting Style
features.description: You adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty.

features.name: Divine Smite
features.description: When you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, you can expend a spell slot to deal radiant damage.

features.name: Spellcasting
features.description: You gain the ability to cast paladin spells using Charisma.

features.name: Divine Health
features.description: You are immune to disease.

features.name: Sacred Oath
features.description: You swear a Sacred Oath that binds you to a divine cause.

features.name: Ability Score Improvement
features.description: Increase one ability score by 2, or two ability scores by 1.

features.name: Extra Attack
features.description: You can attack twice when you take the Attack action.

features.name: Aura of Protection
features.description: You and friendly creatures near you gain a bonus to saving throws equal to your Charisma modifier.

features.name: Sacred Oath Aura
features.description: Your Sacred Oath grants you a powerful aura feature.

features.name: Aura of Courage
features.description: You and friendly creatures within your aura are immune to being frightened.
